text: Kenneth Brown is the name of: *Kenneth Brown (playwright) (born 1954), playwright, actor, director and producer *Kenneth Brown (academic) (1933–2010), American peace studies academic *Kenneth Brown (author) (Kenneth P. Brown, Jr.), president of the Alexis de Tocqueville Institution *Kenneth Brown (pastoralist) (1837–1876), Western Australian pastoralist, explorer and executed murderer *Kenneth Brown (journalist) (1868–?), journalist *Kenneth Brown (interior designer) (born 1971), interior designer *Kenneth Brown (mathematician) (born 1945), professor working in category and cohomology theory *Kenneth Charles Brown (1925–2016), Canadian diplomat *Kenneth L. Brown, American diplomat *Kenneth M. Brown (1887–1955), pulp and paper worker and political figure in Newfoundland *Kenneth Francis Brown (1919–2014), Hawaiian Islands political and business man ==See also== *Ken Brown (disambiguation) *Kenneth Browne, American painter
title: Kenneth Brown
